Do I recommend this game?

That depends: do I like playing showcases of things and not actual games?

I am saddened to see this game not added to the original Half-Life 2 storyline as it certainly showed allot of promise, combining decent storyline with 'What-Can-This-Do?' gameplay. This being said, the Half-Life 2 story is long enough without this portion of fast paced action sequences and believe that Valve made the right decision by including this game in the purchase price off Half-Life 2 but not including it in the main storyline. 10/10
Интересный уровень, забавный опыт, но короткий. Жаль. Будит воспоминания о 2 части основной игры
Ooooh look, a tech demo!
Try it out, nice dlc thing
Nagyon jó.

En Half-Life 2: Lost Coast podemos ver el potencial del motor Source, consiste en un mapa (La costa perdida) con guías de los desarrolladores en las que nos van explicando como realizaron ese trabajo.

Gran potencial.... imprescindible si quieres saber mas cosas sobre el motor source, sobre half-life o sobre el desarrollo de videojuegos.

Duranción aproximada: 20-30 minutos, con posiblidad de extender se a 1 h. o 1,30 h. si te paras a contemplar todo el trabajo.
Der letzte Schrott.
If you hit "up" + "down" + "right" + "W" + "A" + "Start" + "Select" + "3", the door will open and you will have accest to Half-Life 3.

Невышедший уровень из Half-Life 2, получивший право на жизнь благодаря технологии HDR. Самое интересное во всем этом - не новые полчаса геймплея, а комментарии разработчиков. Для всех, кто интересуется игростроем, будет очень полезно и познавательно. Да и сама технология HDR смотрится очень даже ничего.

Игра хороша, но вот только она состоит из 1 небольшой миссии, а стоит как отдельная полноценная игра.
Если покупать - то только в составе комплекта.
the fisherman was nice
I play this for the story.
Got this game for free. If you can get it for that price it is definitely worth it.

Bueno, su duracion apenas llega a los 5 minutos. Pero cumple su funcion que es presentar el nuevo motor source. Si lo juegas con los comentarios de desarrollador, durara bastante mas y aprenderas sobre por que se hizo todo como se hizo. No aporta nada a la historia de half life, excepto que te presenta la maquina que lanza los cohetes de los headcabs. Siempre me pareceio un interesante pequeño añadido a half-life 2
It's awesome that u give a tour like this, would be fun to have a more detailed version of it, such as story backgrounds and hidden events in the story etc!

A fun little tech demo, wish it was longer but the "stress test" is good for checking out new video cards/drivers

It came with Half Life 2 in the Orange Box and it is very short. However after playing HL ep 2, its relaxing to play something with little to no plot. It wasn't a waste time, yet didn't add much to the Half Life experience over all.
good, but basically just a demo for half life two, good if you want to try it out but don't want to buy it

Lost Coast is the biggest waste of time and is a completely pointless game to play. Although it comes free with Half-Life 2 I’m just telling you that it’s not worth playing and is just pretty pointless at this time. It’s about 10 minutes of going up a cliff side and through a little town killing combine and killing a combine helicopter the end about 10 minutes that’s it. This map was initially supposed to be a level during the Highway 17 chapter in Half-Life 2 but was cut and then was used as a test for HDR which serves as the only point of this is to see Half-Life 2 in HDR. 

+Cool map
+Dev commentary
+Gabe says Gaben :)
+HDR

-Literally like 12 minutes or so of gameplay extremely short boring not worth playing
-I really don’t see the point in this whatsoever. It's a cut level so even then it’s a HDR test which I don’t see why is public and or is still given to players who buy Half-Life 2 as I’m sure Valve isn’t collecting results from this anymore. Would be nice if this would be sold independently as players could get this on their own accord instead of forcing everyone who buys Half-Life 2 this pointless game. 
-Remote Play doesn’t work

This is nice to see Half-Life 2 in HDR although personally I didn’t see much of a major difference from the main game. Even with this cool visual upgrade this demo was really short and uneventful and ik the whole point just to show off the HDR and listen to the dev commentary along with it. Personally I just felt it to be rather pointless to have bundled with Half-Life 2 as it’s put into your Steam library as a separate game. It would be nice if it was just an option to load into on the main game instead of being a seperate game all together. Otherwise it would be nice if you could just download it and play on your own instead of being forced to own this seperate game by buying Half-Life 2. Just rather pointless. I don’t feel like the HDR is so amazing that this is worth playing.
half life 2's  long lost brother???? after all it lost its meaning to play it and enjoy it.
After having played this 5 minute demo for a total of 8 hours, I, a dead beat do approve.

DONT BUY THIS GAME! no its not bad its a tech demo and its hella expinsive BUT its in a bundle with half life 2 so buy that game instead and you will also recive thisone and btw 40$ for a tech demo? WTF VALVE

short episode for TRUE HL fans.
8/10

Half-Life 2: Lost Coast was supposed to be for Highway 17. Personally I don't know why they removed it. The puzzle solving in this is very true to regular Half-Life, (No duh) and for once you can kill the helicopter. The lighting is very nice and shows the true potential of the source engine, and quite honestly, the overall campaign (if you can call it that) wasn't half bad. (No pun intended) Overall, very nice if you want to get a bit more out of Half-Life. 

Final Score: 9/10
Do not buy this game. I didnt buyed but it comes with Half Life 2 so if you gonna buy this i will come to your room and i will kill you :) . Have fun !
Очень интересно пройти и послушать комментарии разработчиков
yes good for all my on steam and you can get it for free if you get half life 2

Si estás instalando Half-Life 2: Lost Coast, con la esperanza de jugar otro DLC del juego original, siento decepcionarte, pero no es realmente un juego.

Lost Coast, es un sólo capítulo de 19 minutos de duración (en mi caso, aunque si sabes orientarte mejor, incluso menos) en el que Valve nos quiere enseñar su nueva tecnología, el HDR (High Dynamic Range Imaging). Más que un juego, Lost Coast es como una demostración gráfica.

La verdad es que todo el entorno que nos acompañará durante los 3 o 4 combine soldiers que nos carguemos y el helicóptero del final, lo jugaremos con unos gráficos preciosos.

Obligatorio jugarlo con los gráficos al máximo.

игра маленькая но не плохая советую попробовать.
P.S игра досталась мне бесплатно :)
this i the another part of half life 2

I played for exactly 43 minutes. I also finished the game. About 20 minutes were spent goofing off throwing boats at combine soldiers and marveling at the Pink and Black tiles that show up when you jump into the pirhanna infested water. Utterly Pointless. At least I got this when it was on sale for 80% off in a bundle with Half Life 2, which is AWESOME. So just get Half Life 2 by itself.

For a free little extra that came with the full version of Half Life 2, this was actually pretty enjoyable. It had the same basic gameplay and strategy as the rest of the game, and it had a decent setup. I give it 8.5 false HL3 confirmations out of 10.

Oh, and I am now part of the Steam minority who has actually PLAYED this demo. So I have that going for me, which is nice.
Note: Read the sign! IT COMES WITH THE HL complete pack! Thats why it is 40 stinking bucks!
I find it funny that you can just buy half life 2 and get this along with it,better then spending 40.00 for the whole valve games that ran on the same engines as half life,minus portal.

Tento kousek získáte zdarma k Half-life 2, projití vám zabere půl hodiny, pokud se budete hodně poflakovat. Jde hlavně o to, že v tom mají být uvedené nějaké nové herní mechanizmy nebo co, takže proto se to takhle dává. Asi k testování. piece of shit 20min

Half-Life 2: Lost Coast is not so much of a game as it is a tech demo showcasing elements of the Source engine. It offers interesting commentary by the developers who are clearly passionate about their work while allowing you to briefly return as Gordon Freeman and take on enemies with all your old weapons. Established fans of the Half-Life series will get the most out of this experience.
sogar fü eine demo der source engine zu kurz.
Demo técnica. No esperen mucho
eine kleine ergänzung zu Half-Life 2

So I went back and replayed the half life series today, and I was inthralled in how immersive and massive the game felt. It was made in 2004, but it's beautiful by today's standards. The characters all feel so real and genuine. For anyone who hasn't played it, I strongly recommend you do.

Even this little tidbit, only one level, still conveyed a lot of the story to me, and I wish it was in the real game.

10/10

Although it was purely for graphical demonstration, it was extremely good. You only play it once and not play it again, but it was a great demonstration.
WHERE ARE MY DRAGONS?!

This is a great little piece of Half-life that was used in the original Source engine demos. They cut it from the game but I think it was never a part of it, just a tech engine level. Reason being, it used HDR lighting and that is a feature of the Source engine that HL2 didn't use at all. People were upset by that but hey, here it is now. It's fun, beat it in 19 minutes but it came with my HL2 purchase here on Steam. It wasn't advertised with it but it was included. It's nice to see, the HDR, but it's not a must own.

8/10.

Though this only took ~half an hour to complete, it was still pretty entertaining. At first I though it may have been a whole expansion that I missed from the series, but it's just a short preview/demo/commentary type thing. 

This is included with half-life complete so chances are there's no need to explain/convince you to get this or play it. It all boils down to if you have any interest in what the developers of the game have to say. Very little on the story side, but fun nontheless.
Don't buy this with money. It comes with Half-Life 2. And if you were planning to get this, just buy the Half-Life complete pack... it costs just as much as this...

Игра показывает и даже рассказывает о развитии движка Source.Обязательно советую играть с комментариями,без них нет смысла даже покупать если вы ждали сюжета.В общем,тут рассказывают о том что не смогли впихнуть в Half-Life 2
Amazing short demo

Миловидное дополнение для тех, кто соскучился по Half-Life 2 буквально на полчаса, с осмотром видов и достопримечательностей. Изменения хорошо видны невооружённым глазом, а с комментариями разработчиков ещё лучше - они наглядно раскладывают свою работу по полочкам и тем самым обьясняют необходимость тех или иных элементов геймплея. Я даже пару раз ловила себя на машинальном выполнении основных  действий, как и было продумано разработчиками.
Ребята старались, тем более - бесплатно) Так что глянуть вполне можно.
В оценке не нуждается)
BEST. SIDE-GAME. EVER!!!

If you want Half Life 2: Lost Coast, just get HL2 Ep1, it has 4 different games.  The way they plan on setting up their next games is shown in this small game.  I look forward to how they use some of these techniques.
this comes free with the 10 $ half life 2. So why is it so expensive?

No es un juego o expansión de HL2 en sí. Solo es una misión en un mapa pequeño en la que debes desactivar un arma de los Combine. Se completa en 20 min aproximadamente. Contiene comentarios de los desarrolladores sobre los gráficos HDR (High Dynamic Range). Está incluido en el paquete Half-Life Complete. Lo recomiendo solo para fanáticos de Half-Life.
I've played a lot of games, This game Sucks dickhole

Lost Coast est a prendre comme un petit cadeau sympa de Half Life 2 . Il faut rappeler que cette mini-extension avait été mise au point afin de mettre en avant la technologie HDR (une révolution a cette époque) . En plus on a meme les commentaires des développeurs pour le coté "bonus collector" . Se finit tres rapidement : 1 chapitre de 20 minutes maximum (a refaire eventuellement dans tous les modes de diffuculté).
eh it was good but not half life good
WORTH 99 BUCKS
This is a nice little game. The graphics are great and so is the voice acting. I would recommend this to anyone who loves Half-Life, like me. Or to anyone who loves this type of game.

If you want a more full-filling half-life 2 story, get it with the HL2 sale or bundle. The add-on was pretty good for the most part, but the mission was is only like 15-30 min. I finnished the game in 9 to 12 min. because i thought there was more to it or that you can walk around and explore the island. But all you really do is blow up the combine missile "lancher" , it sounds fun, but more like a tech demo then anything, even though it gives you more textures and better looking game, get it on a sale.

It is a fine "game". It is a short little mission where you go to the top of a mountain to destroy a headcrab pod launcher. Just buy Half Life 2 and this comes free, or at least it did with me. DO NOT SPEND THE MONEY TO BUY ONLY THIS!!!!!

This is a very interesting showcase of HDR in Half Life 2, and I hope that Valve includes little addons like this for their games in the future. This outtake level of Half Life 2 has commentary from Valve develpers that explain how certain things work to make the game very realistic. From explaining when they change up the gameplay to showing how some texture mapping works, I enjoyed this half-hour(no pun intended)of playing Half LIfe 2: Lost Coast.

This is just a short demo game Valve made to show off their new engine. This was a while ago (therefore engine is no longer new, lol).
Do not expect any long gameplay or anything, it is precisely what it looks like - just one chapter.
Not much storyline either, but graphics and level design are good.
